objects.specification: The floor is a seamless square expo booth platform spanning 5 by 5 meters, composed of sturdy modular panels with a smooth light gray matte finish. The surface is level and durable, designed to support furniture and foot traffic while maintaining a clean modern aesthetic.

This smooth structural wall panel stands 3 meters tall and 0.1 meters thick, forming part of the enclosing boundaries of the booth. It features a minimalistic design with a uniform light gray matte finish for a cohesive exhibition look.

This smooth structural wall panel stands 3 meters tall and 0.1 meters thick, forming part of the enclosing boundaries of the booth. It features a minimalistic design with a uniform light gray matte finish for a cohesive exhibition look.

This reception desk features a sleek modern design with a rectangular form factor measuring 1.5 meters wide, 0.5 meters deep, and 1 meter tall. The desk is finished in a vibrant bright red high-gloss lacquer, with clean straight edges and hidden storage compartments for a professional exhibition presentation.

This tall display pedestal stands 2 meters high with a 0.5 by 0.5 meter square base. It features a sleek straight-edged column design finished in a glossy vibrant blue, ideal for showcasing products at eye level.

This tall display pedestal stands 2 meters high with a 0.5 by 0.5 meter square base. It features a sleek straight-edged column design finished in a glossy vibrant yellow, ideal for showcasing products at eye level.

This round table features a circular top 1 meter in diameter with a height of 0.75 meters, supported by a slender central pedestal. The tabletop is finished in smooth white matte, offering a clean, contemporary look that complements surrounding seating.

This seating unit is a modern exhibition chair standing approximately 1 meter tall, with a gently curved backrest and a 0.6 by 0.6 meter footprint. The chair is finished in a vibrant matte green, featuring a sturdy four-leg base and ergonomic back support for comfortable visitor meetings.

This decorative banner is a thin elongated rectangle measuring 0.8 meters wide, 2 meters tall, and 0.02 meters thick. It is made from lightweight fabric with a vibrant red color and a subtle sheen, designed to hang flat against the booth’s back wall for visual impact.

This decorative banner is a thin elongated rectangle measuring 0.8 meters wide, 2 meters tall, and 0.02 meters thick. It is made from lightweight fabric with a vibrant blue color and a subtle sheen, designed to hang flat against the booth’s back wall for visual impact.

This decorative banner is a thin elongated rectangle measuring 0.8 meters wide, 2 meters tall, and 0.02 meters thick. It is made from lightweight fabric with a vibrant yellow color and a subtle sheen, designed to hang flat against the booth’s back wall for visual impact.

This pendant light features a minimalist cylindrical shade measuring 0.2 by 0.3 meters, suspended by a thin cable. The interior emits a warm yellow LED glow through a translucent diffuser, creating an inviting lighting accent above the booth floor.

This decorative potted plant stands approximately 0.8 meters tall with broad lush green foliage emerging from a slender central stem. The plant is rooted in a modern cylindrical ceramic pot with a clean white finish, adding a natural accent to the booth environment.

This decorative balloon cluster consists of multiple glossy spherical balloons in a variety of vibrant colors, tied together with slender white strings. The balloons vary in diameter and form a buoyant arrangement measuring roughly 0.8 by 1.0 by 0.8 meters, providing playful ceiling-level decoration.
